title: Joe Burrow, LeBron-Zion, Cowboys, Combine, and Deontay Wilder
itunes:title: Joe Burrow, LeBron-Zion, Cowboys, Combine, and Deontay Wilder
description:
Colin explains why QB Joe Burrow's hand size is a concern, what he thinks of people comparing Zion to LeBron, the latest on the contract situation between QB Dak Prescott and the Dallas Cowboys, the NFL Combine, and Deontay Wilder's excuse for losing his fight against Tyson Fury. Guests include Bruce Arians, Ric Bucher, Albert Breer, and Howie Roseman.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
